title: Notwithstanding anything contained above, if and when a cotton textile mill is taken up for developm
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained above, if and when a cotton textile mill is taken up for development / redevelopment for any industrial/commercial purposes, the mill owner or the developer or the occupier of the premises shall on priority provide employment to the worker or at least one member of the family of the worker in the employ of the mill on the 1st January, 2000 who possesses the requisite qualifications or skills for the job.
